identity.mission: Create a premium, rugged, and dynamic dating app for travelers that breaks the 'generic dating app' mold.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Tactical Gear' aesthetics with 'Luxury Travel' vibes.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'exciting' and 'urgent'.
Content is King: User photos are the heroes; UI recedes into the dark.
Zoom In: High-impact, full-screen imagery for profiles.
Negative Space: Use deep dark space to create mystery and focus.
anti_patterns: No flat, boring gray backgrounds. Use texture and depth.
No 'Bootstrap' grids. Use asymmetric, dynamic layouts.
No 'Rainbow' gradients. Stick to the strict Gold/Midnight/Signal palette.

headings.usage: Uppercase, tight tracking (-0.02em), used for all screen titles and major CTAs.

body.usage: Clean, legible, used for bios, chats, and settings.

spacing.scale: Tailwind default but doubled for 'breathing room' (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-brand-gold to-yellow-600 text-background font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:scale-105 transition-transform shadow-glow
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/20
buttons.fab: fixed bottom-24 right-6 w-14 h-14 rounded-full bg-brand-gold text-background shadow-glow flex items-center justify-center z-50 animate-bounce-slow

cards.profile: relative w-full aspect-[3/4] rounded-3xl overflow-hidden shadow-deep border border-white/5
cards.glass: bg-background-glass backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-xl p-6

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-20 bg-background-glass backdrop-blur-2xl border-t border-white/5 flex justify-around items-center z-50

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white focus:border-brand-gold focus:ring-1 focus:ring-brand-gold transition-all placeholder:text-gray-600

implementation: Banner on Discover Page: 'Hot Travelers Nearby' (Horizontal Scroll)
Central Tab in Bottom Nav: 'Map' icon
Map View: Dark mode map tiles (CartoDB Dark Matter), Gold pulses for users
FAB: 'Check In' button on Map screen to broadcast location

chat.style: Bubble-free or modern bubbles. Sent: Gold gradient. Received: Dark Glass.

profile.gallery: Full-screen vertical scroll or Tappable story-style gallery.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Midnight Highway' theme strictly. Implement the 'Nearby' feature with maximum prominence as requested. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Ensure the app feels 'native' with smooth transitions between screens.
